verses.verse: The <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G1078>genealogy<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>
To <S%G11>Abraham<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac;<s%> and to <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob;<s%> and to <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> <S%G2455>Judah<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers;<s%>

and to <S%G2455>Judah<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5329>Perez<s%> and <S%G2196>Zerah<s%> by <S%G2283>Tamar;<s%> and to <S%G5329>Perez<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2074>Hezron;<s%> and to <S%G2074>Hezron,<s%> <S%G689>Ram;<s%>
and to <S%G689>Ram<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G284>Amminadab;<s%> and to <S%G284>Amminadab,<s%> <S%G3476>Nahshon;<s%> and to <S%G3476>Nahshon,<s%> <S%G4533>Salmon;<s%>

and to <S%G4533>Salmon<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1003>Boaz<s%> by <S%G4460>Rahab;<s%> and to <S%G1003>Boaz<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G7098>Obed<s%> by <S%G4503>Ruth;<s%> and to <S%G7098>Obed,<s%> <S%G2421>Jesse;<s%>

and to <S%G2421>Jesse<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> the <S%G935>king.<s%> And to <S%G7035>David<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> by her [who had been the wife] of <S%G3774>Uriah;<s%>
and to <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G4497>Rehoboam;<s%> and to <S%G4497>Rehoboam,<s%> Abijah; and to Abijah, <S%G7>Asa;<s%>
and to <S%G760>Asa<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2498>Jehoshaphat;<s%> and to <S%G2498>Jehoshaphat,<s%> <S%G2496>Joram;<s%> and to <S%G2496>Joram,<s%> <S%G3604>Uzziah;<s%>
and to <S%G3604>Uzziah<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2488>Jotham;<s%> and to <S%G2488>Jotham,<s%> <S%G881>Ahaz;<s%> and to <S%G881>Ahaz,<s%> <S%G1478>Hezekiah;<s%>
and to <S%G1478>Hezekiah<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G3128>Manasseh;<s%> and to <S%G3128>Manasseh,<s%> <S%G300>Amon;<s%> and to <S%G300>Amon,<s%> <S%G2502>Josiah;<s%>
and to <S%G2502>Josiah<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2423>Jeconiah<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> at the <S%G1909>time<s%> of the <S%G3350>deportation<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3350>deportation<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> to <S%G2423>Jeconiah<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G4528>Shealtiel;<s%> and to <S%G4528>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%G2216>Zerubbabel;<s%>
and to <S%G2216>Zerubbabel<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G10>Abihud;<s%> and to <S%G10>Abihud,<s%> <S%G1662>Eliakim;<s%> and to <S%G1662>Eliakim,<s%> <S%G107>Azor;<s%>
and to <S%G107>Azor<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G4524>Zadok;<s%> and to <S%G4524>Zadok,<s%> <S%G885>Achim;<s%> and to <S%G885>Achim,<s%> <S%G1664>Eliud;<s%>
and to <S%G1664>Eliud<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1648>Eleazar;<s%> and to <S%G1648>Eleazar,<s%> <S%G3102>Matthan;<s%> and to <S%G3102>Matthan,<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob;<s%>

and to <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> from <S%G11>Abraham<s%> to <S%G7035>David<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> and from <S%G7035>David<s%> to the <S%G3350>deportation<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> and from the <S%G3350>deportation<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon<s%> to [the time of] <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1078>birth<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was as <S%G3779>follows.<s%> When His <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> had been <S%G3423>betrothed<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> they <S%G4905>came<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> she was <S%G2147>found<s%> to be with <S%G1722>child<s%> <S%G1064><s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

And <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> her <S%G435>husband,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>man,<s%> and not <S%G2309>wanting<s%> to <S%G1165>disgrace<s%> her, <S%G1014>desired<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> her <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G2977>secretly.<s%>

But when he had <S%G1760>considered<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to him in a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2501>"Joseph,<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> do not be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G3880>take<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> as your <S%G1135>wife;<s%> for that which has been <S%G1080>conceived<s%> in her is of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

"And she will <S%G5088>bear<s%> a <S%G5207>Son;<s%> and you shall <S%G2564>call<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> for it is He who will <S%G4982>save<s%> His <S%G2992>people<s%> from their <S%G266>sins.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1096>took<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> that <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G3933>virgin<s%> shall be with <S%G1722>child,<s%> <S%G1064><s%> and shall <S%G5088>bear<s%> a <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and they shall <S%G2564>call<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1694>Immanuel,<s%>" <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3177>translated<s%> <S%G1510>means,<s%> <S%G2316>"God<s%> with us."

And <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1453>arose<s%> from his <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> as the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4367>commanded<s%> him, and <S%G3880>took<s%> [her] as his <S%G1135>wife,<s%>

and <S%G3756>kept<s%> <S%G1097><s%> her a <S%G3756>virgin<s%> <S%G1097><s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> she <S%G5088>gave<s%> <S%G5088>birth<s%> to a <S%G5207>Son;<s%> and he <S%G2564>called<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
